newsitem.title: UK: China deports BBC crew which filmed in Moslem area.
newsitem.headline: China deports BBC crew which filmed in Moslem area.

text.p: Three BBC television journalists were detained while filming in China's Moslem Xinjiang region last week and later deported, the BBC said on Wednesday.
A spokeswoman said the team were now safely back in Britain.
"A team working for the BBC were detained in China while filming there and were then asked to leave," she said.
She said she did not know the contents of the film, which was in the early stages of being made. The journalists were deported to neighbouring Pakistan after a very short period of detention.
